title: Atomic Design
body: In this entry, there is an Icon. It's my dog, Aspen! This <Icon> is an atom. The hook <Title> that reads 'Atomic Design', and this <Paragraph>, also atoms, makes up the molecule <IconContent>. Each atom, molecule, and Organism is it's own React Hook. Putting these pieces together from small to large, makes it easier to break out any page you can picture a set of deliberate steps.
